name: Light In The Darkness (itch) (MonteDev)
description:
MADE IN 48H

This game was made for 'Kenney Game Jam 2020' where you had to make a game within 48h with the theme "Cursed".

ESCAPE

Your goal is to find the exit door and escape from a cursed place in the dark! But don't be afraid! You have a torch that you can use to see better! But...there are some monsters that will try to block your way, if you have the torch on. Use the torch to deceive the monsters and find the exit!

STRATEGY

I remind you that you are in a strategic game, so you will move according to a grid and with a turn-based system. Each move you make equals one turn, each turn monsters can move one square, just like you! If monsters don't see you, they won't move, take advantage of the torch!

COMMANDS

Oh, so easy:

-[WASD]/[ARROW KEYS] to move the player

-[X] to ON/OFF the torch

HOW TO DOWNLOAD

Windows:

  • Download ".zip" file
  • Extract ".zip" file wherever you want
  • Open ".exe" to play the game
